hashKey.description: The name of the field to use as the hash key

rangeKey.description: The name of the field to use as the range key

nonKeyFields.description: An array of the non key fields to include. This is only necessary if using the projection type INCLUDE.

projectionType.description: The projection type to indicate which non key fields to include. This corresponds to the DynamoDB projection type enumerator values: ALL, KEYS_ONLY, INCLUDE. The default value if not specified is ALL.
